alert.note: Alert for Calvert (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued December 23 at 6:43AM EST until December 23 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Calvert County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 3 PM EST this afternoon, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...At 3.0 feet, parking lots near Charles Street in Solomons begin to flood, with several inches of water covering low-lying portions of Charles Street and Williams Street. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides two to two and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Solomons Island is at 1:54 PM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at North Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.6 ft, Moderate 2.6 ft, Major 3.6 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/03 PM 2.8 1.4 1.5 0.5 None 24/02 AM 1.0 -0.4 0.6 0.5 None 24/05 PM 1.2 -0.2 -0.2 0.5 None 25/04 AM 0.4 -1.0 -0.1 0.5 None 25/05 PM 1.0 -0.4 -0.3 0.5 None Patuxent River at Solomons Island MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 4.0 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 23/01 PM 3.0 1.5 1.8 1.0 Minor 24/01 AM 1.2 -0.3 0.3 1.0 None 24/02 PM 1.0 -0.5 -0.2 1.0 None 25/02 AM 0.7 -0.8 -0.3 1.0 None 25/04 PM 1.0 -0.5 -0.3 1.0 None 26/03 AM 0.8 -0.7 -0.2 1.0 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
